Based on above data Create few tabbed butons with an icon on the first tab, on clicking each tab , the clicked tab should be highlighted, while other tabs are back to default format.

the first tab contains a section with an icon. make sure the icon section is created with pseudo elements. just assume the dimensions and text sizes for the coding challenge, give appropriate shadows

each tabs should have below format, you are allowed to add any class or id to it if needed. cannot create another dom element inside but allowed to create any preudo elements. you can add containers around the entire tabs.

you are allowed to lookup on google for css tags and syntaxes

<div class="tabbedContainer">

<div class="tabCount">6</div>

<div class="tabText">total recipes</div>

</div>

Design of tab below

colors used:

background : #262727

tabButton color: #3d403f

tab HighlightCOlor: #555757

Text color: #dbdbdb

#8ee3e6

#afd1a8

#ababa0

#c47c73

base 64 source of icon design below

url(data:image/svg+xml;base64,)
